bibl.title: Christian Papyri from the Oslo Collection.
bibl.note: 1. P. Osl. Inv. 1661 (= van Haelst 359). Fragments of a Papyrus codex containing Biblical texts in Greek and Coptic, IV cent. A.D. - 2. Inv. 1644 (= van Haelst 343). Christian Amulet (with the Lord's Prayer). Probably Oxyrhynchus, 2nd half of IV cent. A.D.
bibl.seg: Amundsen Leiv, Christian Papyri from the Oslo Collection.

1. P. Osl. Inv. 1661 (= van Haelst 359). Fragments of a Papyrus codex containing Biblical texts in Greek and Coptic, IV cent. A.D. - 2. Inv. 1644 (= van Haelst 343). Christian Amulet (with the Lord's Prayer). Probably Oxyrhynchus, 2nd half of IV cent. A.D.
C.R. par Marcel Hombert, ChrEg 23 (1948) Nos 45-46, pp. 195-196.
